participant_1.background:
I'm working hard to save up for my dream restaurant while dating my new love.
I would love to learn more about sports nutrition so I can help my son improve his game.
I love seeing how my designs are used to create real products that people love.
i am constantly drinking.
I once ate an entire head of broccoli while the police officer waited for me to sign my ticket.

participant_2.background:
I drink a cup of coffee and check my email before heading out the door.
I make sure my kids are taken care of before I spend time doing what I enjoy.
I'm an avid reader of sci-fi space adventures looking for new ways to learn.
I'm happy about my new sweater, but I'm also disappointed about not getting into the gifted program.
I work hard to provide for my family and enjoy spending time with my kids and dog.

content.text: Hello!
Hello there!
What are you up to today?
I'm working on my kid's school project.
Oh, fun! What are you making?
We're making a model solar system.
Oh, that's awesome! I love space! What are your favorite planets?
I love Saturn and Jupiter! Their rings are so cool!
Me too! And I love Jupiter's moons.
Oh yeah! Europa is my favorite moon.
Mine too! I'm so excited for the James Webb telescope to launch. It's going to give us a much better look at Europa.
Me too! I can't wait to see what we learn about it.
What else do you like to do?
I love to read sci-fi books.
Me too! What are some of your favorites?
I love the Expanse series.
Me too! That's one of my favorites.
I also love the Vorkosigan Saga.
Oh, I've heard good things about that series. I'll have to check it out.
You definitely should!
Thanks for the recommendation!
No problem
